string.text: Heavy Pockets
Traders may offer you more rare and expensive goods.
Through trading, looting and stealing you have accumulated a small fortune. Your personal wealth is well known and traders will favour your patronage.
You have attained the "Heavy Pockets" achievement.
Radiotherapy
You have a chance of surviving an emission without anabiotics.
Strangely, you no longer feel haunted by the groans of an approaching emission. You believe there to be a chance they may be more forgiving towards you.
You have attained the "Radiotherapy" achievement.
Infopreneur
Traders will now pay you a small additional bonus for each PDA delivered to them.
Whether selling or buying, to many people information is just as valuable as artefacts. Word has spread that you are a reliable source of such a commodity.
You have attained the "Infopreneur" achievement.
Duga Free
Paths through Yantar and Radar are now easier to access.

After seeing what reckless experimentation has brought to the Zone you have taken action into your own hands. Paths through Yantar and Radar are now open since disabling the Miracle Machine and Brain Scorcher.
You have attained the "Duga Free" achievement.
Well Dressed
There is a small chance of field dressing additional body parts from slain mutants.
Rightly so does the Zone's wildlife fear you - more than a fair share has fallen at your hands. Lately, you have noticed your bloody harvest has become more bountiful than usual.
You have attained the "Well Dressed" achievement.
Silver or Lead
Surrendering stalkers may occasionally reveal the location of a second stash.
Bodies and bullet casings litter the tracks behind you. The stories you leave are infamous. You often wonder why some place possessions above their lives. Perhaps things will soon begin to change.
You have attained the "Silver or Lead" achievement.
Mechanized Warfare
You are able to fully upgrade equipment at a technician other than Forester.
Forester's services have never been cheap, but at least now he has some competition. That mechanic should make good use of those tools you brought him.
You have attained the "Mechanized Warfare" achievement.
Tourist
You recall seeing some curious stashes during earlier journeys.

Despite the dangers, you have explored all accessible parts of the Zone. From the murky depths of the Great Swamps to the metal maze of the Truck Cemetery - you know the Zone like the back of your hand.
You have attained the "Tourist" achievement.
Rag and Bone
Your luck with future stashes has slightly increased.
What's theirs is yours, or so you like to think. You have an act for finding other people's stashes. Despite some misfortune here and there, you feel that for the most part your luck is improving.
You have attained the "Rag and Bone" achievement.
Completionist
All available achievements have been attained.

All there there is to acheive has been achieved. You know the Zone better than the Zone knows itself. And despite all odds being stacked against you and every threat you've faced - you still remain undefeated.
You have attained the "Completionist" achievement.
Wishful Thinking
You have discovered the location of the Wish Granter.
At first you heard the rumours, but now you've seen it yourself - the Wish Granter is very real. Its voice echoes in your head - beckoning to speak with you.
You have attained the "Wishful Thinking" achievement.
Clear Skies
You have attained the "Clear Skies" achievement.
Geologist
Artefacts have a slightly higher chance of spawning.

Once again you cautiously navigate through an anomaly, hoping to claim its riches for yourself. After so many successful endevours, you can't help but notice that artefacts seem easier to detect than before.
You have attained the "Geologist" achievement.
